author: David Child
title: Fighting fake news: The new front in the coronavirus battle
description: Bogus stories and half-baked conspiracy theories are surging through the internet.
content:
London, United Kingdom - The theories have spread almost as fast as the new coronavirus: Chloroquine is a proven cure, children are immune and 5G caused the pandemic.
From the seemingly plausible to the predictably untrue, fake news about COVID-19, the disea… [+13016 chars]
